name: SpacExit
description:
SpacExit is a game about using the character's unique abilities in combination and outside the box thinking to achieve victory. 

controls :

  • Mouvement (W,A,S,D)Switch 
  • Character (Space bar) 
  • R to restart the level

The Strong Guy :  

  • push/pull boxes (shift) 
  • launch other characters (left click next to target) (when equipped with his bandana)          

The Tinker : 

  • automatically build a box after collecting 4 wooden planks 

The engineer : 

  • able to turn ON/OFF fans (left click when nearby)

Credits :
